Title: Coronavirus: Who should wear face mask; do they stop Covid-19 spread | Explainer - India Today
Description: Close-fitting masks, such as N95 ones, can offer good, but not total protection against infectious droplets, while the next rank up, the N99-rated masks can give better protection, but some find them difficult to breathe through.

Title: Smokers likely to be more at risk from coronavirus: EU agency - Times of India
Description: Europe News: Smoking can make people more susceptible to serious complications from a coronavirus infection, the European Union agency for disease control said on

Title: India bans export of key malaria drug amid coronavirus outbreak - Reuters India
Description: The Indian government said on Wednesday that it is banning the export of hydroxychloroquine and formulations made from the medication, as experts test the efficacy of the drug in helping treat patients infected with COVID-19.

Title: British pensioners plead for Foreign Office rescue from Indian hospital quarantine - Telegraph.co.uk
Description: Five elderly British tourists being held in ‘extremely poor conditions’ in an Indian quarantine facility after testing positive for coronavirus have pleaded with the Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) to do more to help them.

Title: Cipla chairman: Govt steps encouraging, but don’t ignore chronic ailments - The Indian Express
Description: Amid the coronavirus outbreak, The Indian Express caught up with Cipla chairman Y K Hamied to find out how they are preparing to meet this challenge.

Title: Can blood from coronavirus survivors treat the newly ill? - India Today
Description: Doctors in China attempted the first COVID-19 treatments using what the history books call "convalescent serum" -- today, known as donated plasma

Title: India faces spike in coronavirus cases, says study, in test for health system - India Today
Description: The total number of confirmed coronavirus cases in India has crossed the 570-mark. With another patient passing away in Tamil Nadu, India has now reported 11 Covid-19 deaths.

Title: The 4 Stages Of Coronavirus & Where We Stand Right Now - ScoopWhoop
Description: According to the researchers there are four stages of the Novel Coronavirus and India is currently believed to be at Stage 2.
